Trade/Device Name(s): Verigene Staphylococcus Blood Culture Nucleic Acid Test (BC-S)
Specimen Container(s): BACTEC™M Plus Aerobic/F blood culture bottle
BacT/ALERT FA FAN® Aerobic blood culture bottle
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Verigene Staphylococcus Blood Culture Nucleic Acid Test (BC-S) for rapid molecular detection of Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus epidermidis, and mecA resistance marker directly from positive blood cultures.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, multiplexed in vitro diagnostic test for simultaneous detection and identification of Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus epidermidis, and mecA resistance marker directly from positive blood cultures to aid in diagnosis of bacterial bloodstream infections, used in conjunction with other laboratory findings.
